aplus_text: Just like the skin, our scalp also sheds dead skin. It accumulates dirt & buildup over a period of time that clogs the pores, affecting hair growth and making the scalp prone to dandruff. So, it becomes necessary to exfoliate the scalpto clear the dead skin & dandruff to prevent anCoffee, known to be one of the best exfoliators, is great forIt is gentle on the scalp & its particles cleanse the scalp, effortlessly. It also strengthens the hair & promotes hair growth. Coffee Scalp Scrub is ideal forand. Along with Coffee, thisalso has Natural AHA for exfoliation &, Caffeine for roots stimulation and Rosemary for soothing & healing the inflamed scalp.Coffee Scalp Scrub is loaded with Coffee & Natural AHA, both of which are known to control dandruff and exfoliate the scalp. They scrub off the buildup & dead skin, leaving your scalp clean & fresh.You don't need a scrubber to get rid of dead skin & buildup from your scalp. The Coffee Scalp Scrub has perfectly-sized Coffee particles that effortlessly exfoliate the scalp, leaving it fresh & clean.mCaffeine's Coffee Scalp Scrub has been crafted for every scalp & hair type.In the dry scalp, the skin gets irritated and flakes off, while dandruff occurs when there’s too much oil on the scalp. However, both result in an itchy scalp with whitish flakes. A few common causes of dandruff are oily skin, not shampooing enough, or even excess humidity in the air.
